channel.title: Year-worth-of-ideas on AshLogs
channel.description: Recent content in Year-worth-of-ideas on AshLogs

item.title: create course out of 8085 Emulator project
item.description: A step by step walkthrough for how to emulate certain chips such as 8085 , 6502 and later build a physical computer.

item.title: Easy Payment System For Cryptocurrencies
item.description: introduce reprogrammable cards that can hold account hash for different cryptos with instant transaction time. also create a card reader for those cards which can verify the amount in that account and charge the account.
